Description: Results of the fifth Mental Health & Learning Disability Inpatient Census and Out of Scotland NHS Placements Census, 2019.
Name: Inpatient Census 2019: parts one and two
Notes: Accessing the Publications link at top LHS of page lists >13k publications but a search of Inpatient Census reveals other potential relevant data, including Part Three of this census and associate XLS spreadsheet. Future inclusion requires discussion.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page accessed via Supporting files link top RHS of page.
Sizing Notes: Messy structure, multiple tables on same tab, multiple dimensions with subdimensions and multiple footnotes.
